question: IRCTC has launched which new booking feature recently?
explanation:
The Indian Railways Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) has launched a new bus ticket booking service through its new microsite.
The new feature allows passengers to book bus tickets online. IRCTC has tied up with over 50000 state road transport and private bus operators, covering 22 states and three union territories. IRCTC already provides online railway and flight tickets.
